css.title: Custom Style
css.description: Customize footnote blockref, selected text style, and footnote content block style

saveLocation.title: Footnote Location
saveLocation.description: Current document, Specified document or Child Document

docId.title: Specified Document ID
docId.description: Takes effect when footnote location is set to Specified document

footnoteContainerTitle.title: Footnote Container Title
footnoteContainerTitle.description:
Set the document title to store footnotes when the footnote location is set to Current Document.
Template variable: Current document title ${filename}

footnoteContainerTitle2.title: Footnote Container Title
footnoteContainerTitle2.description:
Set the document title to store footnotes when the footnote location is set to Specified Document.
Template variable: Current document title ${filename}

footnoteContainerTitle3.title: Footnote Container Title
footnoteContainerTitle3.description:
Set the document title to store footnotes when the footnote location is set to Child Document.
Template variable: Current document title ${filename}

updateFootnoteContainerTitle.title: Auto-update footnote container title?
updateFootnoteContainerTitle.description: Auto-update footnote container title to match template every time a footnote is created?

enableOrderedFootnotes.title: Enable Footnote Numbering
enableOrderedFootnotes.description: Use numeric footnotes (like [1], [2], etc.) instead of custom anchor text. When enabled, all footnotes will be automatically reordered and renumbered.

footnoteAlias.title: Footnote Block Alias
footnoteAlias.description: Set the alias for footnote content blocks

floatDialog.title: Enable Footnote Dialog
floatDialog.description: Enable the dialog for adding footnotes

template.title: Footnote Template
template.description:
Template variables: ${selection} is the content of the selected text , ${content} is the placeholder for footnote content, and ${refID} is the block ID containing the selected text
${{...}} for Sprig templated, e.g. ${{now | date "20060102 15:04:05"}}
You can use kramdown syntax to style the block.

reset.title: Reset Settings
reset.description: Reset all settings to default values
reset.label: Reset
reset.confirm: Are you sure you want to reset all settings of this plugin to default values?

errors.noDocId: [Block Ref Footnote Plugin] Please fill in the specified document ID
